speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is David. Who's calling?

speaker: Agent
text: This is Sarah from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thanks. What's this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m reaching out regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Before we proceed, can you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, David. Can you also confirm your current address for verification?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming that information. You have a balance of $250 due. How would you like to resolve this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay half of it today and the rest next month.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds reasonable. So, you would like to pay $125 today?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I will set that up for you. Thank you for your time, David.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you, Sarah. Talk to you soon.
